pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau speaks with President-elect Iván Duque of Colombia | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml: Yesterday, the Prime Minister spoke by phone with the President-elect of Colombia, Iván Duque. Prime Minister Trudeau congratulated the President-elect on his electoral victory, and underlined the importance of strong and wide-reaching Canada-Colombia bilateral relations, including in regional and multilateral bodies. Discussion touched on the current crisis in Venezuela, continued commitment to Colombia’s peace process, and advancing progressive trade to create good, middle class jobs and grow the economy in both our countries.
